txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken great swords from the Orcs surrounding Gabilshathûr. Delivery of the items should be made to Avar at the dwarf-outpost.
'That serves them right! We'll melt this down and forge it right.'
'Sometimes we find ourselves in short supply of workable metals. Orcs have weapons, and those weapons can be melted down and forged right. Do you understand what I mean?'
Thorin's Hall Task: Broken Great Swords
The dwarves at Gabilshathûr await a delivery of broken great swords to be made to Avar.
Deliver the broken great swords to Avar at Gabilshathûr in Angmar
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver broken great swords from the Orcs surrounding Gabilshathûr to Avar at the dwarf-outpost.
Wanted: Broken great swords from the Orcs surrounding Gabilshathûr.
